The New Girl: For when one Deschanel on your network is NOT ENOUGH. #tcas11

Every time Zooey Deshanel talks with her hands, my hands echo involuntarily. It's like Surprised Kitty. #tcas11

Pretty sure I won't be able to tweet anything about Zooey Deschanel w/o using the word "adorable" a lot. Or, "crazy adorable." Totally sweet

"When did you first know you were adorable?" asks one smitten reporter. She gets flustered and offers thanks. Which is of course adorable.

"When did you first know you were adorable?" This is officially my least favorite panel ever. #tcas11
